short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes all password fields on the page visible by click on a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to see what are you typing in password field, but the platform do not provide show/hide button?
Do not worry, here is why we created this extention. Simply click on a button, or use CTRL+B (Command+B on mac) and it will magically reveil what are you typing.
We do not store any password information neither locally or remotely. 
The project if fully open-sourced and can be found on my github profile
https://github.com/dmytro-afonin/pwd-viewer
